.. _reference_grad:

Gradients
=========

.. module:: grad

The module :mod:`arasea.grad` allows to compute the gradient of an Arasea graph.

.. autofunction:: arasea.gradient.grad

This section of the documentation is organized as follows:

* :ref:`Derivatives in Arasea <reference_gradient_tutorial>` gives a hands-on introduction to how to build gradient graphs in Arasea.
* :ref:`Gradients API <reference_gradient_api>` is an API reference for the :mod:`arasea.gradient` module.
